10. Misc Commands¶

10.1. DIAG¶

Opens the diagnostics window.

Syntax:

DIAG

Example:

>> DIAG

10.2. BYE¶

Disconnects from the server.

Syntax:

BYE

Example

>> BYE

10.3. CHANNEL_GRID¶

Opens a window displaying all the channels currently running on the server.

Syntax:

>> CHANNEL_GRID

Example:

>> CHANNEL_GRID
